site_name: Kingston House15 Coombe RoadKingston Upon ThamesKT2 7AB
description: Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Approved Plans) and removal of Condition 5b (Construction Management Plan) of Planning Permission ref: 19/01813/FUL (Variation of Condition 2 (Approved Drawings) of Planning Permission 15/12978/FUL (Demolition of existing office and ancillary building. Erection of part 3 part 6 storey building for 2,478sqm floorspace for a two form entry primary school for a maximum of 420 pupils including provision of double basement for double height sports hall and provision of a raised play deck; and 19 flats (5 no. 1 bedroom flats; 10 no. 2 bedroom units; 4 no. 3 bedroom units). Provision of up to 94 cycle stands.) to amend drawings to allow for elevational treatment changes, and internal layout changes) dated 11/10/2019. Application to consist of removal of duplicate condition and changes to brickwork, elevations and canopies to ground floor school play area
